name: emoncms
description: Emoncms is a web-based application for logging, graphing, and processing energy and environmental data. Designed for energy monitoring setups, it supports feeds, dashboards, input processing, and integration with IoT devices.
features: Energy Monitoring: Track power consumption and generation. Understand your energy usage.
Data Visualization: Beautiful graphs and dashboards for insights. Clear energy patterns.
Feed Processing: Transform and analyze incoming data streams. Flexible data handling.
IoT Integration: Connect with energy monitoring devices. Comprehensive system support.
Environmental Data: Log temperature, humidity, and more. Complete monitoring solution.
Self-Hosted: Keep your energy data private. Your consumption, your control.
